data.title: London Airport Transfers Specialists - Umbrella Transfers
data.meta_description: London Airport Transfers, cities connections, events, chauffeur service for business and pleasure. Private car hire service with 24/7 support, including seamless Transfers To and From Airport for all your travel needs.
data.meta_site_name: Umbrella Transfers - Travelling for Business and Pleasure
data.text:
There is a small charge for processing the payment to our customers for unexpected situations where a journey needs to be cancelled (as long as this is done with 24 hour in advance of the requested pick-up time). We understand that sometimes the unpredictable happens and for unforeseen reasons you simply can’t make it.

If you would like to cancel your booking with us, you can do this by emailing us with your booking reference and reason of cancellation. Alternatively you can call our Operating Centre or simply cancel the booking in the customer app.

Pre-paid bookings will be refunded in maximum 5 working days from the moment of cancellation.

If a booking is cancelled less than 24 hours prior to the schedule pick-up time by customer, there will be a cancellation fee applied, which depends on the time we were informed…

More than 24 hours before pick-up time = 5% charge applied / 95% refund

Between 24 and 3 hours before pick-up time = 30% of journey price

Between 3 hours and up to the pick-up time = 50% of journey price

Once journey has commenced (driver on the way), or If you double booked with a different company, but failed to inform or cancel the journey with us, or If you have booked a journey with us, but did not turn up, we will require 100% of journey price.

We strongly suggest to pay for the journey 24h prior to the scheduled pickup time to avoid any charge.

Umbrella Transfers provides reliable and safe Minicab Private Transfers Services. Our main operating area is London, and surrounding Cities however we serve customers with connection to London and local Airports from whole England, Wales and Scotland. We specialised in Chauffeuring Services, London Airports Transfers, Cruise Ports Transfers, Cities Connections, Private Day Trips, Everyday Commute and Events services. A large selection of cars of various sizes together with professional chauffeurs will satisfy the most demanding customers. Either you travel alone or with a family, it is a business trip or an event – we will find a perfect car tailored to your needs. With us, your journey will be pleasant and safe.

Minicab taking staff to a meeting. Airport Transfers for your executives. Fleet to take your delegates to and from your event. Umbrella Transfers offers organisations a smooth, discreet and flexible form of business travel as well.

We have a great experience in private hire industry – we cooperate with the biggest Travel Agencies by providing Airport Transfers, Executive flees for Corporates, Wedding Cars, Day Trips. We work directly with Universities by doing University Transfers for students. Our main goal is to provide satisfying and affordable transfer for all our clients. We guarantee satisfaction, discretion and individually prepared packages for organisations.

With us you will get on time to every meeting, important party or simply every airport around. Either you are heading for holidays or coming back, our reliable service will take you to and from every airport in London – Stansted, Luton, Heathrow, Gatwick, Biggin Hill, Farnborough and City Airport; Ports – Southampton, Portsmouth or Dove; UK cities like: Bath, Bicester Village, Birmingham, Bletchley, Bournemouth, Brighton, Bristol, Buckingham, Cambridge, Canterbury, Cardiff, Coventry, Windsor, Eastbourne, Edinburgh, Guilford, Royal Leamington Spa, Leeds, Leicester, Liverpool, Manchester, Milton Keynes, Northampton, Norwich, Nottingham, Oxford, Plymouth and many more. you can choose between few different transport alternatives when traveling from/to those Airports, Ports or Cities. When booking with Umbrella Transfers you can relax – our driver will be on time, waiting for you in a designated area at the scheduled pickup time when arriving to the airport, port or train station – holding board with your name. We will take you and your family to your destination in safe and comfort way. Let’s travel with style.

“Umbrella Transfers – always open”

Umbrella Transfers provides easy and safe London Private Transfers, Minicab services between London, Airports, Cruise Ports, and other UK Cities. You don’t need to look further – we offer cheap and efficient UK Cities Connection from and to London, London Airports – Heathrow, Stansted, Luton, Gatwick, City Airport, Biggin Hill, Farnborough and Southend-on-sea, or UK Ports – Southampton, Portsmouth, Dover and more.

You can relax and be sure you are in right hands – we have 4 years of experience in London Private Transfers, Minicab Service industry. Hundreds journeys, thousands customers served by professionals, planned and executed in the best way on the market. Your Private Transfer has never been easier, more comfortable and reliable than with us. Every day we are serving customers who need Private Transportation in the UK. Our cheap connections between cities will be in most cases cheaper than train. Door to door service, Free Wi-Fi and refreshments will satisfy even the most demanding customers.

Book your journey today to get the best London Private Transfers. We don’t practice surge prices, but when booking in advance you can rest and relax without worrying. Once booked, Every Private Transfer provides the very best experience. We always want to improve our services so please, spend a few minutes to leave us feedback (whether through social media, yell, tripadvisor or google). We’ll much appreciate it.

“Umbrella Transfers – where every journey matters”

If you travel to or from London with a coach, train, car or private transfer, you will need a little bit more time for journey than you think. London might be very jammed during peak hours. We always advice to take a little bit more time into consideration. From our experience we would like to show you a few examples of how much extra time You need:

From 7am till 10am traffic can delay your Transfer by 40/50% than what your sat nav shows

From 10am till 3pm traffic can delay your Transfer by 20% than what your sat nav shows

From 15pm till 7:30pm traffic can delay your Transfer by 40/50% than what your sat nav shows

From 7:30pm till 7am traffic is usually very low and your Transfer should take no more than 10% more than what your sat nav shows.

You need to consider day of the week, events, road works or accidents on the road. It’s better to have a coffee at the airport with friends than miss the flight ?

If you need a transfer from any UK city to literally any place in London, Umbrella Transfers will provide the best service you can get.
